headline: General Dynamics Surges On Results; These Defense Stocks To Report
summary: General Dynamics stock surged out of a buy zone on Wednesday after its second-quarter report.  In a busy week for defense contractors, quarterly results have been mixed.  Lockheed Martin, RTX and Northrop Grumman reported on Tuesday.

raw.headline: General Dynamics Surges On Results; These Defense Stocks To Report

headline: General Dynamics' Q2 Earnings & Revenues Beat Estimates, Improve Y/Y
summary: GD Q2 earnings beat estimates and rise 14.7% year over year. It also witnesses surging backlog, driven by strong Marine, Tech and Aerospace gains.

headline: Morgan Stanley names Northrop and RTX as Top Picks in defense and aerospace
summary: Investing.com -- Morgan Stanley has named Northrop Grumman (NYSE:NOC) and RTX Corp its new Top Picks in the defense and aerospace sectors, respectively, citing improved program economics and compelling valuations.

summary: Northrop Grumman Corp (NOC) reports robust earnings with a 28% EPS increase and strategic investments in production capacity, despite challenges in tax reform and contracting environment.

headline: NOC Q2 Deep Dive: Defense Demand, International Growth, and Key Program Progress Drive Results
summary: Security and aerospace company Northrop Grumman (NYSE:NOC) reported Q2 CY2025 results exceeding the market’s revenue expectations, with sales up 1.3% year on year to $10.35 billion. The company expects the full year’s revenue to be around $42.15 billion, close to analysts’ estimates. Its non-GAAP profit of $6.94 per share was 1.5% above analysts’ consensus estimates.
